text: Pierre Bellon (24 January 1930 – 31 January 2022) was a French billionaire businessman. He was the founder of Sodexo, a food management company. Bellon died on 31 January 2022 in Paris, one week after his 92nd birthday.Sodexo : Pierre Bellon, l’ogre des cantines, est mort He graduated from HEC Paris. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Paris Category:Alumni of HEC Paris
